title: This PC is TERRIFYING - Intel Extreme Tech Upgrade
description: Thanks to Intel for sponsoring this video! You can purchase an Intel 12700K at   Alex is hosting his first Intel Extreme Tech Upgrade, and we couldn't just make it easy for him. Tynan came ready to go with copper hardline tubing, a sick case and even an induction forge to make it all happen. Will these guys be able to make our most intense ETU yet?  Discuss on the forum:   Buy an 011 Dynamic Evo Case:   Buy an MSI MAG Z690 Tomahawk:   Buy an Intel 12700K:   Buy an EK Quantum Velocity2 Water Block:   Buy an EK Quantum Surface:   Buy a kit of Crucial Ballistix DDR4:   Buy a Sony A7000 Soundbar:   Buy Samsung 980 Pro SSD:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:    FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0   Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Because Intel Let Me 0:45 Invading the Space 2:37 The Parts 5:11 Linus Isn't Even Here 5:34 Starting the Build 7:54 "Managing" Cables 10:19 A Computer that Can Kill 14:19 Don't Try this at Home 18:37 The Hardline Tubing 20:50 The Door Behind the Door 21:55 Glam Shots 23:01 Outro
